title: The only truth about life is that you die, or death, ironically. That said, what is the ultimate truth about death? Is it then true that death should happen sooner rather than later? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty good question, actually. I have a pretty good answer. The ultimate truth about death is——YOU DON’T REALLY DIE. Your soul leaves your body, rests a bit——that’s the entire purpose of death, rest—-then reincarnates. You absolutely, positively do NOT have to take my word for this. The existence of the soul and reincarnation is something that be logically deduced and experimentally proven. There is already a TON of anecdotal evidence in the form of reincarnation studies that show we are all eternal beings with eternal souls and always have been. Here, let me post the entire thing, theory and possible ways of building a soul-detector plus one reincarnation study and, this being Quora, you can decide for yourself. It’s all quite simple. Won’t take ten minutes. And oh, by the way, the ultimate result of the scientific confirmation of the existence of souls and reincarnation will be the absolute, utter, permanent, irrevocable destruction of all evil on Earth. See my story at the end. (Original source: Jeff Corkern's answer to Why do so many people believe in life after death when there is no scientific proof of it?) NEITHER of these experiments has been done—-YET. They will be. It’s an historical inevitability and an historical necessity if the human race is to survive the present century. In the meantime, we have anecdotal data in the form of reincarnation studies. Cases of people spontaneously remembering past lives have been quietly accumulating for decades now. There is actually MORE than enough data for scientists to start wondering how to build a soul-detector. A theory based ONLY on scientific principles, with NO citing of religious texts or demands for faith, no calls to “Belie-e-e-ve, brother!” Just calm, clear logic. This theory right here. It’s all quite simple. Won’t take ten minutes. And oh, by the way, the ultimate result of the scientific confirmation of the existence of souls and reincarnation will be the absolute, utter, permanent, irrevocable destruction of all evil on Earth. Please note that “keeping the Universe safe from its sentients” is a totally logical, totally SCIENTIFIC, reason for believing in an afterlife. No citing religious texts.
